title: Selling apple pencil
content:
I am selling apple pencil 2nd generation. Brand new condition with original apple box. 
I am planning to get a new ipad and this pencil is not compatible with it.

comments.body: Is it compatible with classmate notebook (asking for a friend)
I wrote my ISA's with it, so yes. Inbuilt eraser, pressure sensitivity works like a charm.
You forgot to mention that it automatically writes the answers for you
